Social.Name: anvil
Social.SelfOnTarget: You drop an anvil on *VICTIM*'s head.
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* drops an anvil on your head!

Social.Name: bear
Social.SelfNoTarget: You roar like a grizzly bear.

Social.Name: behind
Social.SelfNoTarget: You look for something to hide behind.
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* looks for something to hide behind.

Social.Name: bitchslap
Social.SelfOnTarget: You bitchslap *VICTIM* like a two cent hooker.
Social.RoomOnTarget: *ACTOR* bitchslaps *VICTIM* like a two cent hooker.
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* bitchslaps you like a two cent hooker.

Social.Name: bonk
Social.SelfOnTarget: You bonk *VICTIM* on the head. This means war!
Social.RoomOnTarget: *ACTOR* bonks *VICTIM* on the head. This means war!
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* bonks you on the head. This means war!

Social.Name: boo
Social.SelfNoTarget: You boo and hiss in disgust.

Social.Name: bounce
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* is so excited, *A-HESHE* can hardly keep still!

Social.Name: cornholio
Social.SelfNoTarget: You shake uncontrollably and put your shirt over your head.

Social.Name: crazy
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* gets a crazy look in *A-HISHER* eyes.

Social.Name: curl
Social.SelfNoTarget: You curl up in a ball.
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* curls up in a ball to sleep.

Social.Name: defenestrate
Social.SelfNoTarget: You dive out of the nearest window.
Social.SelfOnTarget: You toss *VICTIM* out the nearest window.
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* tosses you out the nearest window.

Social.Name: doh
Social.SelfNoTarget: You slap yourself on the head.

Social.Name: doodle
Social.SelfNoTarget: You doodle pictures in the dirt.

Social.Name: expose
Social.SelfOnTarget: You expose yourself in front of *VICTIM*.
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* gets naked in front of you.

Social.Name: fft
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* spits like a cat: fft! fft!

Social.Name: fist
Social.SelfNoTarget: You shake your fist at the gods.
Social.RoomOnTarget: *ACTOR* shakes a fist at *VICTIM* in rage.
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* shakes a fist at you in rage.

Social.Name: freak
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* freaks out in a bad way.

Social.Name: fume
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* fumes. You can almost see the steam.

Social.Name: grr
Social.RoomOnTarget: *ACTOR* stares at *VICTIM* with a look of hatred.
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* threatens you with a look of death.

Social.Name: halo
Social.SelfNoTarget: You point at the halo about your head.
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* points at the halo about *A-HISHER* head.

Social.Name: hammer
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* hammers you on the head. Ouch, that hurt!

Social.Name: hbeer
Social.SelfNoTarget: Drink a beer in whose honor?
Social.SelfOnTarget: You drink a beer in *VICTIM*'s honor.
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* drinks a beer in your honor.

Social.Name: jk
Social.SelfNoTarget: You tell everyone you're just kidding.

Social.Name: knee
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* painfully knees you in the crotch.

Social.Name: lag
Social.SelfNoTarget: You inform everyone you are lagging horrendously.

Social.Name: livejournal
Social.SelfNoTarget: You sell your soul to capitalism.

Social.Name: moon
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* drops *A-HISHER* pants and moons the world.
Social.RoomOnTarget: *ACTOR* moons *VICTIM*. It's a full moon tonight!
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* moons you. It's a full moon tonight!

Social.Name: mope
Social.SelfNoTarget: You mope sadly in a corner.

Social.Name: pan
Social.SelfNoTarget: Smack whom over the head with a frying pan?
Social.SelfOnTarget: You smack *VICTIM* over the head with a frying pan.
Social.RoomOnTarget: *ACTOR* smacks *VICTIM* over the head with a frying pan.
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* smacks you over the head with a frying pan.

Social.Name: pants
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* yanks down your pants! How embarrasing!

Social.Name: peck
Social.SelfNoTarget: You peck the ground like a chicken.
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* pecks the ground like a chicken.

Social.Name: pet
Social.SelfOnTarget: You pet *VICTIM* on the back of the head.
Social.RoomOnTarget: *ACTOR* pets *VICTIM* on the back of the head.
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* pets you on the back of the head.

Social.Name: phew
Social.SelfNoTarget: You wipe your brow in relief.

Social.Name: pinch
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* pinched *A-HIMHER*self. It looks like it hurt.

Social.Name: pose
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* strikes a triumpant pose for you.

Social.Name: rag
Social.SelfNoTarget: You wipe your mouth with a rag.
Social.SelfOnTarget: You offer *VICTIM* a drool and slobber rag.
Social.RoomOnTarget: *ACTOR* gives *VICTIM* a drool and slobber rag.
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* gives you a drool and slobber rag.

Social.Name: relax
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* takes a deep breath and sighs comfortably.

Social.Name: rofl
Social.SelfNoTarget: You roll on the ground laughing.
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* rolls on the ground in a fit of laughter.

Social.Name: roll
Social.SelfNoTarget: You roll your eyes in exasperation.

Social.Name: sad
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* gets a sad look in *A-HISHER* eyes.

Social.Name: shuffle
Social.SelfNoTarget: You shuffle from side to side.
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* shuffles nervously from one foot to the other.

Social.Name: sigh
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* lets out a long, sad sigh.

Social.Name: slobber
Social.SelfNoTarget: You slobber all over the place.

Social.Name: spaz
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* spazzes out, running around and tripping all over *A-HIMHER*self.

Social.Name: squeal
Social.SelfNoTarget: You squeal like a stuck pig.

Social.Name: strip
Social.SelfNoTarget: You strip off all your clothes.

Social.Name: swat
Social.SelfNoTarget: You swat at flies in the air.
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* swats at flies in the air.

Social.Name: tantrum
Social.SelfNoTarget: You run around the room and break stuff.
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* runs around the room and breaks stuff.

Social.Name: vomjom
Social.SelfNoTarget: Challenge whom to a game of starcraft?
Social.SelfOnTarget: You challenge *VICTIM* to a game of Starcraft.
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* challenges you to a game of Starcraft, insisting that you will lose in a horrible way.

Social.Name: wall
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* stands *A-HISHER* ground like an impenetrable wall.

Social.Name: warn
Social.SelfOnTarget: You give *VICTIM* a glance of warning.
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* gives you a glance of warning.

Social.Name: whimper
Social.SelfNoTarget: You whimper like a beat dog.

Social.Name: wild
Social.SelfNoTarget: You growl like a trapped wild animal.
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* growls like a trapped wild animal.

Social.Name: woot
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* jumps and yells, \"Can I get a WOOT! WOOT!\".

Social.Name: worry
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* gets a worried look on *A-HISHER* face.

Social.Name: worship
Social.VictimOnTarget: *ACTOR* bows down in worship of you.

Social.Name: writhe
Social.RoomNoTarget: *ACTOR* falls to the ground and writhes in pain.
